title.value: Extension UK Core Care Setting Type

description.value: The care setting type provides the originating care setting for the document.

purpose.value: This extension has been developed to support the exchange of information about the type of care setting associated with the resource being extended, which is currently not supported by the FHIR standard.

short.value: An extension to carry the Care setting type of the document

definition.value: An extension to carry the Care setting type of the document
The type of care setting expressed as a code and display value defined in the SNOMED CT UK Refset of the valueSet used.
